wiki.content:
This electro-pop track was a #1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100. Making it Maroon 5's 2nd #1 hit on the chart and Christina's 5th. This marks the first time two Best New Artist recipients have collaborated on a Billboard #1 hit. The song was released on June 21, 2011 in conjunction with a live performance of the song on the USA  talent show, "The Voice." Both Maroon 5 frontman Adam Levine and  Christina Aguilera are coaches on the show.
